   #scale_fill_manual(values=col.pal) +

    xlab('sample') +
    scale_fill_ipsum() +
    theme_ipsum_rc(grid = "XY") +

      panel.border = element_rect(color = "lightgrey",
                                    fill = NA,
                                    size = 1))
